headline.main: SOVIET HITS BACK TO STEM ATTACKS; Stiff Counter-Drives Launched Northwest of Moscow and in Rostov Region

lead_paragraph: KUIBISHEV, Russia, Nov. 24 -- At this writing the situation around Moscow is still far from clarified. The Germans initial momentum in their current drive has considerably reduced the area of the horseshoe-shaped front covering Moscow, which now can be said to run from the Klin salient on the north and to average fortythree to fifty miles in the distance of the battle line from the capital.
abstract: USSR counter-attacks to stem Moscow push; Rostov area attacks also; threat to Germans seen; Germans reptd in retreat, south of Leningrad; USSR claims battle raging, all fronts
